Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Gilkerson
Reviews.Content: Was disapointed in this tablet. The touch screen on the left side of the tablet wouldn't work. It was very aggravating. Went back to using my old tablet.

ProductInfo.Features:
New BLUETOOTH model launched May 2014, ready to go out of the box, lightweight and easy to use for all age groups
Google Android 4.2 OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Foneso tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed
The A23 1.5Ghz featuring the newest powerful and robust Dual Core CPU with DDR3 RAM making everything run faster than ever. Plus, high-performance Quad Core Mali-400 GPU ensures smooth and dynamic 3D graphics
Built In bluetooth, WiFi, dual camera, latest apps compatible (Facebook, Twitter, Angry Birds, Netflix, YouTube), 4GB flash storage (expandable to 32GB with micro SD card). 512MB DDR3 RAM, USB drives extendable (Flash Drives/HDD/External Keyboard/3G)
At Foneso, we provide robust warranty, on-time customer service and tech support, frequent updates on firmware ensures customer satisfaction. Feel free to contact us with whatever question you have on your mind
ProductInfo.Name: Foneso (tm) NAVY Ultrathin 7" Android Tablet PC with Capacitive 5 Point Multi-Touch Screen Dual Camera A23 Dual Core Processor WIFI Bluetooth [New Upgraded Bluetooth Model May 2014]
